please restore test method in original place, not need to remove it and add it at other place.
We need to minimize diff.

there is no ease way to show that file is empty.
please do it as I did at issue description by printing of its content:
/var/tmp$ cat Test.java 





/var/tmp$
/var/tmp/Test.java // violation

last line it might make sense to put in separate PRE tag, please experiment of better look during rendering.

+ *     <property name="matchAcrossLines" value="true" />
+ *     <property name="message" value="Empty file is not allowed" />
+ * </module>
+ *
+ *

+ * Example of violation from the above config: + *

+ * 
+ * [...This is an empty file] // violation
